schema.title: shopware-cli
schema.description: shopware cli extension configuration definition file

ai_enabled.description: Enables the changelog generation with OpenAI (Requires OPENAI_TOKEN environment variable).

pattern.description: Limit with RegEx which commits should be considered for the changelog generation.

template.description: Allows to override the Go template which renders the Changelog.

variables.description: Allows to write RegEx groups into variables which can be used in the template.

shopwareVersionConstraint.description: Overrides the shopware version constraint in the composer.json/manifest.xml file.

icon.description: Specifies the Path to the icon (128x128 px) for store.

localizations.description: Specifies the languages the extension is translated.

categories.description: Specifies the categories in which the extension can be found.

type.description: Specifies the type of this extension.

automatic_bugfix_version_compatibility.description: Specifies whether the extension should automatically be set compatible with Shopware bugfix versions.

videos.description: Specifies the links of YouTube-Videos to show or describe the extension.

tags.description: Specifies the tags of the extension.

highlights.description: Specifies the highlights of the extension.

features.description: Specifies the features of the extension.

faq.description: Specifies Frequently Asked Questions for the extension.

description.description: Specifies the description of the extension in store.

de.description: Use string or set path to a file with prefix `file:` containing the description, f.e. `file:src/store/manual_de.md`

en.description: Use string or set path to a file with prefix `file:` containing the description, f.e. `file:src/store/manual_en.md`

installation_manual.description: Installation manual of the extension in store.

de.description: Use string or set path to a file with prefix `file:` containing the description, f.e. `file:src/store/manual_de.md`

en.description: Use string or set path to a file with prefix `file:` containing the description, f.e. `file:src/store/manual_en.md`

images.description: Specifies images for the extension in the store.

file.description: File path to image relative from root of the extension

activate.description: Specifies whether the image is active in the language.

preview.description: Specifies whether the image is a preview in the language.

priority.description: Specifies the order of the image ascending the given priority.

tests.description: llama-70b generated negative; focus on minProperties keyword
tests.python_error:
{} should be non-empty

Failed validating 'minProperties' in schema['properties']['build']['properties']['zip']['properties']['pack']['properties']['excludes']:

     'additionalProperties': False,
     'minProperties': 1,
     'properties': {'paths': {'type': 'array',
                              'items': {'type': 'string'}}}}
